flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=90>>90 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*90 = <<1/2*90=45>>45 seashells
He was left with 90-45= <<90-45=45>>45 seashells
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
